de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.im.session

Interface ImSessionFactory<T extends ImSession>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the session type (e.g. IMC or IMV session)
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultImcSessionFactory, DefaultImvSessionFactory

    public interface ImSessionFactory<T extends ImSession>
    Generic factory to create a session for an IM(C/V).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <S extends ImConnectionAdapter,E extends ImEvaluatorManager> 
      T      		 createSession(S connection, E manager)
      Creates a new session for a given connection.

    • Method Detail

      • createSession

        <S extends ImConnectionAdapter,E extends ImEvaluatorManager> T createSession(S connection,
                                                                           E manager)
        Creates a new session for a given connection.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the evaluator manager type
        S - the connection adapter type
        Parameters:
        connection - the connection for the session
        manager - the evaluation composition for the session
        Returns:
        the session
